There was a simple instruction video on set-up, but the brief, in-depth instructional videos were the most helpful.  Unfortunately, the system was not ready-to-use out of the box for me, due to the configuration of my TV/cable system.  I called Customer Service, and can't say enough about how incredibly helpful, patient, and easy-to-understand they were.
